short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An in-browser Markdown notepad. Optimize for writing experience. Free, plus your data doesn't leave you computer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚â° Why do I build this extension ü§î
When reading cool stuffs on the net, I often want to take some notes, but opening my noting applications such as Notion/Obsidian takes much time. So I built this extension to quickly jot down my idea, then later copy to whatever noting systems.


‚â° What it does really well üí™
- Fast & Clean
- Markdown support
- Writing should feel pleasant (sth like Notion editor)
- Your data stays in your computer


‚â° What it *will* do well in the future ‚öôÔ∏è
- Pasting image into the editor
- Searching
- Exporting notes
- Data backup


‚â° Feedbacks üíô
If you have any feedbacks or suggestions, I'm really happy to hear that, feel free to leave me a review
